Intro.content: We've procured a fresh test subject for the experiment.
Our task is to give them a sense of self.
To do this, we must give them a goal.
Collecting some branches for a shelter should do the trick.
First, locate the test subject and we'll take it from there.
They should be somewhere on the west side of this island.

Main1.content: They've already started their search for branches.
We just need to add some more for our test subject.
But try to make it at least a little challenging

Complete - Slow.content: We wanted to evoke a sense of purpose, not hopelessness.
If the task is out of reach, then so is the meaning behind it.

Complete - Fast.content: We're trying to evoke a sense of purpose here.
There's no meaning to be found in trivial tasks.

Outro.content: So we see, by providing a personal goal for the test subject,
for which their own needs come first, the test subject will become aware of their individuality
